ius Reference¶

class ossvt.ius.ius_version[source]¶

Using regex we pull the latest version number from the IUS RHEL5 repo

class ossvt.ius.compare_to_ius_simple[source]¶

A simple function to compare ius_ver to upstream_ver

Warning

The compare_to_ius_simple lib is not used in ossvt and will most likely be removed. compare_to_ius_simple is replaced with compare_to_ius with takes advantage the natsort function.

class ossvt.ius.compare_to_ius[source]¶

Using ossvt.natsort we compare ius_ver and upstream_ver
